definitions.text: a commercial or industrial enterprise and the people who constitute it
the activity of providing goods and services involving financial and commercial and industrial aspects
examples: computers are now widely used in business

definitions.text: the principal activity in your life that you do to earn money
examples: he's not in my line of business
gossip was the main business of the evening
show me where the business was today
Government and business could not agree
they have an upper class clientele

definitions.text: incidental activity performed by an actor for dramatic effect
examples: his business with the cane was hilarious
